attribute.job: broker who needs to work with the receptionists at bank

possbile actions determinant.age_age: bigger / older age tend to speak more like an adult person, while smaller age / younger ones tend to be more naive
possbile actions determinant.job_job: different player will have different jobs, and they interact like the real-world ones.
possbile actions determinant.gender_gender: boys will speak more Machismo, while girls speak more Feminism.

possbile action attributes.words_spoken: what the player should say in the situation
possbile action attributes.emotion: how the words_spoken are spoken, based on the player info
possbile action attributes.body_language: player's body language when speaking the words_spoken
